de:
We welcome  you to "Notre Bastide" for a friendly stay in Marcillac-Saint-Quentin, located 10 mins from the historical center of Sarlat-la-Canéda, in the heart of the Perigord Noir region.

Within a 20km radius, you can enjoy the multiple activities available at the medieval villages of Sarlat, Beynac or La Roque Gageac. Discover the well-known prehistoric region by visiting the numerous caves such as Grottes de Lascaux, Gouffre de Proumeyssac, Fond de Gaume, etc… or the many castles in Beynac, Castelnaud, Les Milandes, etc…

Our region offers a great number of outdoor activities including canoeing, rock-climbing, golf, swimming, horse-back riding, hiking trails, moutain biking, hot air balloon rides, etc… Don’t forget the market to discover the local gastronomic specialities.

It would be our pleasure to guide you towards activities according to your passions and interests.
en:
We welcome  you to "Notre Bastide" for a friendly stay in Marcillac-Saint-Quentin, located 10 mins from the historical center of Sarlat-la-Canéda, in the heart of the Perigord Noir region.

Within a 20km radius, you can enjoy the multiple activities available at the medieval villages of Sarlat, Beynac or La Roque Gageac. Discover the well-known prehistoric region by visiting the numerous caves such as Grottes de Lascaux, Gouffre de Proumeyssac, Fond de Gaume, etc… or the many castles in Beynac, Castelnaud, Les Milandes, etc…

Our region offers a great number of outdoor activities including canoeing, rock-climbing, golf, swimming, horse-back riding, hiking trails, moutain biking, hot air balloon rides, etc… Don’t forget the market to discover the local gastronomic specialities.

It would be our pleasure to guide you towards activities according to your passions and interests.
it:
La nostra bastide è una recente pensione a un piano situata sulle alture di Marcillac St Quentin, vicino a Sarlat e a numerosi siti turistici.
Le nostre tre camere con aria condizionata si trovano al piano terra.
I nostri ospiti al tavolo sono sempre prenotati con 24-48 ore di anticipo.
Godetevi una vasca idromassaggio e una piscina di acqua salata in comune, disponibile dal 1° aprile al 30 ottobre.
fr:
Notre bastide est une maison d'hôtes récente de plain pied située sur les hauteurs de Marcillac St Quentin à proximité de Sarlat et de nombreux sites touristiques incontournables.
Nos trois chambres climatisées sont en rez-de-chaussée.
Nos tables hôtes sont toujours sur réservation 24 à 48 heures à l'avance.
Profitez d'un jacuzzi et d'une piscine au sel partagée disponible du 1 avril au 30 octobre.
es:
We welcome  you to "Notre Bastide" for a friendly stay in Marcillac-Saint-Quentin, located 10 mins from the historical center of Sarlat-la-Canéda, in the heart of the Perigord Noir region.

Within a 20km radius, you can enjoy the multiple activities available at the medieval villages of Sarlat, Beynac or La Roque Gageac. Discover the well-known prehistoric region by visiting the numerous caves such as Grottes de Lascaux, Gouffre de Proumeyssac, Fond de Gaume, etc… or the many castles in Beynac, Castelnaud, Les Milandes, etc…

Our region offers a great number of outdoor activities including canoeing, rock-climbing, golf, swimming, horse-back riding, hiking trails, moutain biking, hot air balloon rides, etc… Don’t forget the market to discover the local gastronomic specialities.

It would be our pleasure to guide you towards activities according to your passions and interests.
nl:
Onze bastide is een recent gelijkvloers gastenverblijf gelegen op de hoogten van Marcillac St Quentin in de buurt van Sarlat en vele toeristische bezienswaardigheden.
Onze drie kamers met airconditioning bevinden zich op de begane grond.
Onze tafelgasten worden altijd 24 tot 48 uur van tevoren gereserveerd.
Geniet van een jacuzzi en een gemeenschappelijk zoutwaterzwembad dat beschikbaar is van 1 april tot 30 oktober.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.

de:
We welcome  you to "Notre Bastide" for a friendly stay in Marcillac-Saint-Quentin, located 10 mins from the historical center of Sarlat-la-Canéda, in the heart of the Perigord Noir region.

Within a 20km radius, you can enjoy the multiple activities available at the medieval villages of Sarlat, Beynac or La Roque Gageac. Discover the well-known prehistoric region by visiting the numerous caves such as Grottes de Lascaux, Gouffre de Proumeyssac, Fond de Gaume, etc… or the many castles in Beynac, Castelnaud, Les Milandes, etc…

Our region offers a great number of outdoor activities including canoeing, rock-climbing, golf, swimming, horse-back riding, hiking trails, moutain biking, hot air balloon rides, etc… Don’t forget the market to discover the local gastronomic specialities.

It would be our pleasure to guide you towards activities according to your passions and interests.
